docs.snippet: The head of Mozambique's opposition movement says a cease-fire declared a week ago will be extended for two months to allow peace talks to continue in a "favorable environment."...

docs.snippet: Belgian equipment rental company TVH Group NV said on Tuesday it had raised its offer for Britain's Lavendon Group Plc to 444 million pounds ($545 million), slightly pipping an offer from French rival Loxam SAS [LOXAM.UL]....
